text: The 1922 TCU Horned Frogs football team represented Texas Christian University (TCU) in the 1922 college football season. The Horned Frogs finished the season 2–5–3 overall. The team was coached by John McKnight in his first and only year as head coach. The Frogs played their home games at Clark Field, which was located on campus in Fort Worth, Texas. ==Schedule== ==References== TCU Category:TCU Horned Frogs football seasons TCU Horned Frogs football
title: 1922 TCU Horned Frogs football team
